name: The Cleansing - Versus
description: The Cleansing - Versus is a competitive, real time tactic, PvP game with RPG elements, set in a feudal dystopian future. You take control of a party of heroes and go to battle. Raise your banner over captured territories to gain capture points and resources.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions) Processor: i5-4460/AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX760 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions) Processor: i5-6500 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX780 or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
